Get USPORTS football offence stats

Source: R/football_offence.R
football_offence.Rd

Get USPORTS football offence stats

Usage

football_offence(year = c())

Arguments

year

The season(s) of interest.

Value

A tibble.

Examples

football_offence(2018)
#> # A tibble: 2,476 × 23
